# 20th SFI IT Academic Festival-- AGH UST 

URL: https://agh.edu.pl/en/students/events/detail/s/20th-sfi-it-academic-festival
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:22:23

20th SFI IT Academic Festival

 27.03.2025 

 29.03.2025 

 Download iCal file 

Add to Google Calendar

Add to Outlook Calendar

Add to Office 365 Calendar

Add to Yahoo Calendar

 The 20th edition of the SFI IT Academic Festival will take place on 27–29 March 2025 in Auditiorium Maximum of the Jagiellonian University. 

 Description 

IT enthusiasts will be able to attend workshops, lightning talks and sessions – from the very basics to advanced topics, in seven subject matters. There will be plenty of opportunities to talk to representatives of top IT companies and, perhaps, find your dream internship or job.

The festival will feature experts from Poland and abroad as well as leaders in science and IT who will talk about the latest trends and technologies shaping the future of computer science.

The competition agenda also includes a competition with prizes.

The SFI IT Academic Festival is organised by the Computer Science Students' Association - KSI UJ, Epicentrum EPI UJ, BIT AGH, i::team UEK, Koło Naukowe Informatyki PK.

Free entry.
